name: Abomination
description: Foolish rabble! You are beneath me!

name: Absorbing Man
description: On Reveal: If the last card you played has an On Reveal, copy its text. (if its in play)

name: Adam Warlock
description: After each turn, draw a card if youre winning here.

name: Aero
description: On Reveal: Move the last enemy card played anywhere to this location.

name: Agatha Harkness
description: Agatha starts in your hand and plays your cards for you.

name: Agent 13
description: On Reveal: Add a random card to your hand.

name: Agent Coulson
description: On Reveal: Add a random 4-Cost and 5-Cost card to your hand.

name: Alioth
description: On Reveal: Remove the text from all unrevealed enemy cards here.

name: America Chavez
description: On Reveal: Give the top card of your deck +2 Power.

name: Angel
description: When one of your cards is destroyed, this flies out of your hand or deck to replace it.

name: Angela
description: After you play a card here, +2 Power.

name: Annihilus
description: On Reveal: Your cards with Power below 0 switch sides. Destroy those that cant.

name: Ant Man
description: Ongoing: If your side of this location is full, +4 Power.

name: Apocalypse
description: When you discard this, put it back with +4 Power.

name: Armor
description: Ongoing: Cards here cant be destroyed.

name: Arnim Zola
description: On Reveal: Destroy one of your other cards here to copy it at the other locations.

name: Attuma
description: After each turn, destroy this if you have another card here.

name: Baron Mordo
description: On Reveal: Your opponent draws a card. Set its Cost to 6.

name: Baron Zemo
description: On Reveal: Recruit the lowest-Cost card from your opponent's deck to your side of this location.

name: Bast
description: On Reveal: Set the Power of all cards in your hand to 3.

name: Beast
description: On Reveal: Return your other cards here to your hand. They cost 1 less next turn.

name: Beta Ray Bill
description: On Reveal: Shuffle Stormbreaker into your deck.

name: Bishop
description: After you play a card, this gains +1 Power.

name: Black Bolt
description: On Reveal: Discard the lowest-cost card from your opponent's hand.

name: Black Cat
description: If this is in your hand after the turn, discard it.

name: Black Knight
description: After you discard a card, add the Ebony Blade to your hand with that card's Power. (once per game)

name: Black Panther
description: On Reveal: Double this card's Power.

name: Black Swan
description: On Reveal: Until the end of next turn, your 1-Cost cards cost 0.

name: Black Widow
description: On Reveal: Add a Widow's Bite to your opponent's hand.

name: Blade
description: On Reveal: Discard the rightmost card from your hand.

name: Blink
description: On Reveal: Swap the last card you played with a higher-Cost card from your deck.

name: Blob
description: On Reveal: Merge cards from your deck into this until it gains 15 or more Power. Ongoing: Can't be moved.

name: Blue Marvel
description: Ongoing: Your other cards have +1 Power.

name: Brood
description: On Reveal: Add 2 Broodlings here with the same Power.

name: Bucky Barnes
description: When this is destroyed, replace it with the Winter Soldier.

name: Cable
description: On Reveal: Draw a card from your opponent's deck.

name: Caiera
description: Ongoing: Your 1 and 6-Cost cards can't be destroyed.

name: Cannonball
description: On Reveal: Move the highest-Power enemy card here away. If you can't, destroy it with a Rock.

name: Captain America
description: Ongoing: Your other cards here have +1 Power.

name: Captain Marvel
description: At the end of the game, move to a location that wins you the game. (If possible)

name: Carnage
description: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards here. +2 Power for each destroyed.

name: Cerebro
description: Ongoing: Your highest-Power cards have +2 Power.

name: Cloak
description: On Reveal: Next turn, both players can move cards to this location.

name: Colleen Wing
description: On Reveal: Discard the lowest-cost card from your hand.

name: Colossus
description: Ongoing: Cant be destroyed, moved, or have its Power reduced.

name: Corvus Glaive
description: On Reveal: Discard 2 cards from your hand to get +1 Max Energy.

name: Cosmo
description: Ongoing: On Reveal abilities wont happen here.

name: Crossbones
description: You can only play this at locations where you are winning.

name: Crystal
description: On Reveal: Each player draws a card.

name: Cull Obsidian
description: You can only play this where you have a 1-Cost card.

name: Cyclops
description: Lets move, X-Men.

name: Dagger
description: When this moves to a location, +3 Power for each enemy card there.

name: Daken
description: On Reveal: Add the Muramasa Shard to your hand.

name: Daredevil
description: On turn 5, you get to see your opponents plays before you make your own.

name: Darkhawk
description: Ongoing: +2 Power for each card in your opponents deck.

name: Dazzler
description: Ongoing: +2 Power for each location thats full on your side.

name: Deadpool
description: When this is destroyed, return it to your hand with double the Power.

name: Death
description: Costs 1 less for each card destroyed this game.

name: Deathlok
description: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards here.

name: Debrii
description: On Reveal: Add a Rock to each other location, for both players.

name: Destroyer
description: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards.

name: Devil Dinosaur
description: Ongoing: +2 Power for each card in your hand.

name: Doctor Doom
description: On Reveal: Add a 5-Power DoomBot to each other location.

description: On Reveal: Pull 4 cards from your opponents hand to their side of this location.

name: Doctor Strange
description: On Reveal: Move your highest-Power card(s) to this location.

name: Domino
description: You always draw this card on turn 2, and not before.

name: Dracula
description: At the end of the game, discard a card from your hand to gain its Power.

name: Drax
description: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +4 Power.

name: Ebony Maw
description: You cant play this after turn 3. Ongoing: You cant play cards here.

name: Echo
description: After your opponent plays an Ongoing card here, remove its abilities.

name: Electro

name: Elektra
description: On Reveal: Destroy an enemy 1-Cost card here.

name: Elsa Bloodstone

name: Enchantress
description: On Reveal: Remove the abilities from all Ongoing cards here.

name: Falcon
description: On Reveal: Return your 1-Cost cards to your hand.

name: Forge
description: On Reveal: Give the next card you play +2 Power.

name: Galactus
description: On Reveal: If youre winning this location and this is your only card here, destroy all other locations.

name: Gambit
description: On Reveal: Discard a card from your hand to destroy a random enemy card.

name: Gamora
description: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +4 Power.

name: Ghost
description: Ongoing: Your cards are always revealed last. (Their On Reveal abilities happen last.)

name: Ghost Rider
description: On Reveal: Bring back one of your discarded cards to this location.

name: Ghost-Spider
description: On Reveal: The last card you played moves here.

name: Giganto
description: You can only play this at the left location.

name: Gladiator

name: Goose
description: Ongoing: Nobody can play cards that cost 4, 5, or 6 here.

name: Grand Master
description: On Reveal: Move one of your other On Reveal cards here to the middle location. Its ability happens again.

name: Green Goblin
description: On Reveal: Switch sides.

name: Groot
description: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +4 Power.

name: Havok
description: After each turn, you lose 1 Max Energy and this gains +4 Power.

description: On Reveal: If you play a card at this location next turn, +3 Power.

description: On Reveal: Afflict all other cards with -1 Power.

name: Helicarrier

name: Hellcow
description: On Reveal: Discard 2 cards from your hand.

name: Hercules
description: The first time another card moves here each turn, move it to another location.

name: High Evolutionary
description: At the start of the game, unlock the potential of your cards with no abilities.

name: Hit-Monkey
description: On Reveal: Gain +2 Power for each other card you played this turn.

name: Hobgoblin
description: On Reveal: Switch sides.

name: Hope Summers
description: After you play a card here, you get +1 Energy next turn.

name: Howard the Duck
description: Ongoing: Tap this to see the top card of your deck.

name: Hulk
description: HULK SMASH!

description: On Reveal: Merge this with one of your cards here.

name: Human Torch
description: When this moves, double its Power.

name: Invisible Woman
description: Ongoing: Cards you play here are not revealed until the game ends.

description: On Reveal: After you play your next card, move it one location to the left.

name: Iron Lad
description: On Reveal: Copy the text of your decks top card.

name: Iron Man
description: Ongoing: Your total Power is doubled here.

name: Ironheart

description: On Reveal: Draw all cards that Cost 0 from your deck.

description: Ongoing: Players must play their first card here each turn. (if possible)

description: On Reveal: Destroy ALL 1-Cost cards.

description: Ongoing: Your cards cant have their Power reduced.
